name: FunnyMapGene_Simulator
description:
A cute world generation simulator!

Players can generate three types of terrain in this simulator:

Desert island。

Southeast Asian Islands。

Indian terrain。

Use the camera to watch this virtual world, and enjoy!

Controls: AWSD, QE for rotation.

Play: The player can control the avatar to move around the map and dig holes. There are little purple people running around on the map of India.
